summary: CashBook Transaction Attachments feature fully tested and working. All 13 backend API tests pass. All 8 frontend UI tests pass. Features verified: Add Entry modal with file upload section, Transaction Details dialog with AttachmentUploader, ProjectFinanceDetail clickable transactions with view dialog.
seed_data_creation: Test attachments created during API testing with TEST_ prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: CashBook Transaction Attachments feature is complete. Backend attachment APIs (upload/download/delete/list) work correctly. Frontend features verified: 1) CashBook Add Entry modal has 'Attach Documents' section with file upload (PDF, JPG, PNG up to 15MB), 2) CashBook Docs column shows eye icons that open Transaction Details dialog with AttachmentUploader, 3) ProjectFinanceDetail Recent Transactions are clickable with Docs column and view dialog showing attachments. Session cookie authentication works - use session_token cookie for authenticated requests.
